verses.roman:
evaṁ viśrāvya bhagavān
mukundo dvārakaukasaḥ
pāvanaḥ sarva-lokānāṁ
viveśa nija-mandiram

synonyms: evam—thus; viśrāvya—making hear; bhagavān—the Supreme Lord; mukundaḥ—Kṛṣṇa; dvārakā-okasaḥ—the residents of Dvārakā; pāvanaḥ—the purifier; sarva—of all; lokānām—the worlds; viveśa—He entered; nija—His; mandiram—palace.
translation: Having thus instructed the residents of Dvārakā, Lord Mukunda, purifier of all the worlds, entered His palace.
